title: Yaarai Polum Illa Neeyum Lyrics Pencil Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Pencil Yaarai Polum Illa Neeyum Song Lyrics
Singer: GV Prakash
Movie: Pencil

Yaarai polum illaa neeyum
Ellor polum ullla naalum
Andru sandhiththom
Adhai engu yaen tholaiththom.

Dhooraththil nee poga kandeney
Pakkaththil ne ennai kandaayaa

Paarkirom sirikkirom
Serndhu naam nadakkirom
Aththanai kaatchiyum
Karpanai, azhagaey.

Nee pona theru oram
Naan nindra naatkal pala.
Thirumbaadha un thalayum
Udhirthidumey pookkal sila.

Thendralae modhinen
Enakku kaayam
Unnaye thaedinen
Thadumaarinen.

Sadu kudu vizhigal aadidudhe
Kanavailum.
Neeye......

Nee illaa neraththil
Odaadhu endhan kadikaara mull.
Enai paathu idhamaaga
Indrenum oru vaarthai Sol.

Vidumurai naatkalai
Verukkireney.
Dhinam dhinam paarkkanum
Unai nerile....

Oru murai thayangiÂ 
Ne paarthadhu marakkumaa?


Yaarai polum illaa neeyum
Ellor polum ullla naalum
Andru sandhiththom
Adhai engu yaen tholaiththom.

Dhooraththil nee poga kandeney
Pakkaththil ne ennai kandaayaa

Paarkirom sirikkirom
Serndhu naam nadakkirom
Aththanai kaatchiyum
Karpanai, azhagaey.
